item.title: Crypto - N00bzCTF23 Writeup
item.description: N00bzCTF 2023 This challenge present’s a relatively simply RSA challenge, I had seen this before in PicoCTF so I was able to solve it pretty quickly, however this was unfortunately the only challenge I had time for that weekend as I was busy. Also, I sadly did not write down the name of the challenge and don’t care enough to go find it so… Enjoy :) Source Code from Crypto.Util.number import * import time flag = bytes_to_long(b'n00bz{***********************}') e = 17 p = getPrime(1024) q = getPrime(1024) n = p*q ct = pow(flag,e,n) time.
